definition: group/a large body of/production brigade/military group
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: Our production brigade has set aside ample reserve grain.
sentences.chinese: 生产大队留出了充足的储备粮。

sentences.english: From grade one, I have been serving as the monitor and school group's committee all the time.
sentences.chinese: 从一年级起，我一直担任着班长以及学校大队委。

sentences.english: A propaganda team in each brigade is responsible for political education.
sentences.chinese: 每个大队有个宣传队负责政治教育。

sentences.english: Now he leads a fire brigade in our city.
sentences.chinese: 现在他是我们市一个消防大队的队长。

sentences.english: Department of Geology and Mineral Resources of North China Petroleum Geological Exploration Bureau census …
sentences.chinese: 地质矿产部华北石油地质局第三普查勘探大队修配厂。

sentences.english: Liverpool have spent a lot of money strengthening and will always be a threat.
sentences.chinese: 利物浦花了很多钱壮大队伍，他们同样是个威胁。

sentences.english: It seemed as though that mass had become a monster and had but one soul.
sentences.chinese: 那一大队人马仿佛变成了一个怪物，并且只有一条心。

sentences.english: And suddenly there was with the angel a multitude of the heavenly army, praising God, and saying.
sentences.chinese: 忽有一大队天军，同那天使一起赞颂天主说。

sentences.english: Finally the captain still did not agree. He was so angry that he went to find the bureau director.
sentences.chinese: 最后大队长还是不同意，他一气之下又去找。

sentences.english: The long line of soldiers and horse and cannon stretched for twenty miles.
sentences.chinese: 大队人马和大炮绵延二十多英里。

sentences.english: I then went to the plantation of the procession and bought some saplings of camphors .
sentences.chinese: 母亲说要栽些树，我就到大队林场去买了些樟树苗。

sentences.english: If China's hockey team beat Canada, wouldnt u have a few questions?
sentences.chinese: 如果中国冰球队干饭了加拿大队，你也会被困扰到么？

sentences.english: Jia generation son followed HuXiaoYue came to the county brigade, met BaiDongJu.
sentences.chinese: 佳代子跟着胡晓月来到了县大队，见到了白冬菊。

sentences.english: Host Canada took the silver and the US picked up the bronze.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大队和美国队分获银牌和铜牌。

sentences.english: The sphere showed a virtual army of Garudans pouring into the basin.
sentences.chinese: 通讯球的影像显示了一大队嘎鲁达人正涌入这个盆地。

sentences.english: The First Party of Hydrogeology and Engineering Geology, Guangdong Bureau of Geology and Mineral Investigation.
sentences.chinese: 广东省地质勘查局水文工程地质一大队。

definition: to be on duty (of a security guard etc)
special duty (e.g. extra security or traffic control on special occasions)/person on special duty
